titles.title: To defer the tax of certain sales of employer stock and reduce certain retirement-related excise taxes, and for other purposes.
To defer the tax of certain sales of employer stock and reduce certain retirement-related excise taxes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
